**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [Blue Viper](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1474) **Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 63 **Perception** +28; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Ysoki](/Languages.aspx?ID=61) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +25 **Str** +0 **Dex** +5 **Con** +5 **Int** +5 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +1 **Infused Items** Blue Viper carries the following infused items: 2 [greater acid flasks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), 4 [greater alchemist's fires](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), 6 [blightburn resins](/Equipment.aspx?ID=108), 4 [greater bottled lightnings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), 3 [deathcap powders](/Equipment.aspx?ID=111), 4 [greater elixirs of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), 2 [greater frost vials](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77), 3 [malyass root pastes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=122), 9 [purple worm venoms](/Equipment.aspx?ID=126), 6 [shadow essences](/Equipment.aspx?ID=127), and 3 [spider roots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=129). These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Blue Viper makes his daily preparations.
**Potent Poisoner** Blue Viper's infused poisons have a DC of 34. **Items** [Dragon Bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112) (applied to body), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_ --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +28 **Will** +22 **HP** 260 **Poisoned Coat** **Trigger** A creature adjacent to Blue Viper hits him with a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike; **Effect** The triggering creature is exposed to [dragon bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112). This consumes the poison, and Blue Viper can't use Poisoned Coat again until he spends 10 minutes applying one dose of contact or injury poison to his clothing. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _shortsword_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d6+6 piercing **Ranged** alchemical bomb +29 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)), **Damage** varies by bomb **Quick Application** Blue Viper Interacts to draw an injury poison and applies it to a weapon he is holding. **Pinpoint Poisoner** When Blue Viper successfully Strikes a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature with a poisoned weapon or exposes a flat-footed creature to an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) poison, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison. **Poison Spray** **Requirements** Blue Viper is holding a [contact](/Traits.aspx?ID=37) or [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison; **Effect** Blue Viper swigs the poison and sprays it out of his mouth, affecting a 15-foot cone. Blue Viper isn't exposed to the poison. All creatures in the cone are immediately exposed to the poison and each creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the poison.
